rukus.text: 25|45|Apani ki apanara rabera prati laksya karena na [1] kibhabe tini chaya samprasarita karena? Tini icche karale etake to sthira rakhate paratena; tarapara amara suryake karechi era nirdesaka.
25|46|Tarapara amara etake amadera dike dhire dhire gutiye ani.
25|47|Ara tini'i tomadera jan'ya ratake karechena abaranasbarupa, bisramera jan'ya tomadera diyechena nidraa [1] ebam chariye parara jan'ya karechena dina [2].
25|48|Ara tini'i tamra rahamatera brstira age susambadabahirupe bayu prerana karena ebam amara akasa hate pabitra pani barsana kari [1]
25|49|yate ta dbara amara mrta bhu-khandake sanjibita kari ebam amara ya srsti karechi tara madhya hate bahu jibajantu o manusake ta pana kara'i [1]
25|50|ara amara to ta tadera madhye bitarana kari yate tara smarana kare. Atahpara adhikansa loka sudhu akrtajnata'i prakasa kare [1].
25|51|Ara amara icche karale pratiti janapade ekajana satarkakari pathate paratama.
25|52|Kaje'i apani kapheradera anugatya karabena na ebam apani kura'anera sahayye tadera sathe bara jihada caliye yana.
25|53|Ara tini'i du'i sagarake samantarale prabahita karechena, ekati mista, supeya ebam an'yati lona, khara; ara tini ubhayera madhye rekhe diyechena eka antaraya, eka anatikramya byabadhana [1].
25|54|Ara tini'i manusake srsti karechena pani hate; tarapara tini take bansagata o baibahika samparkasila karechena [1]. Ara apanara raba halena prabhuta ksamatabana.
25|55|Ara tara allah‌ra paribarte emana kichura ‘ibadata kare ya tadera upakara karate pare na ebam tadera apakara'o karate pare na. Ara kaphera to tara rabera birodhitaya sahayogitakari.
25|56|Ara amara to apanake sudhu susambadadata o satarkakarirupe'i pathiyechi.
25|57|Baluna, ‘ami tomadera kache era jan'ya kono binimaya ca'i na, tabe ye tara rabera dikera patha abalambana karara icche kare.’
25|58|Ara apani nirbhara karuna tamra upara yini ciranjiba, yini marabena na ebam tamra saprasansa pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna, tini tamra bandadera papa samparke abahita hisebe yathesta.

25|59|Tini asamanasamuha, yamina o e du’yera madhyabarti sabakichu chaya dine srsti karena; tarapara tini ‘arasera upara uthalena. Tini'i ‘rahamana’, sutaram tamra sambandhe ye abahita take jijnesa kare dekhuna.

25|60|Ara yakhana taderake bala haya, ‘sajadabanata ha'o ‘rahamana’ -era prati,’ takhana tara bale, ‘rahamana abara ki [1]? Tumi ka'uke sajada karate balale'i ki amara take sajada karaba?’ Ara ete tadera palayanaparata'i brd'dhi paya.
